data.actual_result: A space is removed everytime you hit the Enter key of your keyboard
data.expected_result: Nothing should happen besides displaying the invalid message
data.short_description: [SwiftKey keyboard specific] When the textfield has extra spaces in Add a Friend screen, each tap on the Enter key of the keyboard will erase one space
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Add a Friend screen - Write something then add extra spaces (e.g `"xxx          "` without quotes) - Tap on Enter key on your keyboard. Make sure you're using SwiftKey keyboard (it's the default one installed on Huawei devices, also downloadable from Play store). I was unable to reproduce with GBoard - Repeat step above a few times
